headline: Albertsons outlook, Dow Inc. downgrade, Rocket Lab hypersonic
summary: Josh Lipton examines the trending stories of the trading day on today's Market Minute. Albertsons (ACI) stock is under pressure after the company's full-year earnings outlook fell short of expectations. Bank of America analysts downgraded Dow Inc. (DOW) to Underperform from Buy. Rocket Lab (RKLB) stock gains after announcing new hypersonic business in the US and the UK. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

headline: Dow stock falls following BofA double-downgrade to underperform
summary: Investing.com -- Shares of Dow Inc (NYSE:DOW) dropped 2% as BofA Securities analyst Steve Bryne double-downgraded the company from Buy to Underperform with a price objective (PO) of $28, citing concerns over lower earnings and potential dividend risk. The downgrade comes in light of a "perfect storm" of challenges, including a weakening macroeconomic environment, trade barriers, and rising U.S. feedstock costs.

headline: Earnings Insight: Oil Refiners See Sharp Declines To Q1 Estimates
summary: Energy companies are facing a double headwind: proposed tariffs that threaten to dampen demand, and an unexpected increase in OPEC production that could raise global supply.
